context: hey im good how are you?
Doing good. Thinking of having a movie night with friends.
very cool what sort of movies do you like?

how about Fast 8 or Rocky (1976) Step Brothers (2008) is super funny
Oh I love Rocky (1976) but haven't seen the other one yet.
Yes I love Step Brothers (2008) it is one of my all time favorite movies.
resp: if you like that one I Love You, Man (2009) is a great one too!
